all_features_implemented.details: All 8 utility functions implemented per module-design.md. Hook enforcement updated. Intent detection redesigned. Orchestrator menu updated. Command surface in isdlc.md rewritten.

unit_test_coverage_80_percent.details: 160 new tests added (126 three-verb-utils + 6 hook enforcement + 28 content verification). All pass. CJS suite: 1944/1945 (1 pre-existing). ESM suite: 630/632 (2 pre-existing).

all_tests_passing.details: Zero regressions. All failures are pre-existing and confirmed by testing against main branch with git stash.

code_follows_linting_style.details: CJS module style with .cjs extension. JSDoc comments on all public functions. Consistent with existing common.cjs and provider-utils.cjs patterns.

type_checking_passes.details: Project uses JavaScript (not TypeScript). No type checking configured.

implementation_matches_design.details: All 8 functions match pseudocode in module-design.md. Error codes match error-taxonomy.md (28 codes). Validation rules match validation-rules.json (33 rules).

database_migrations_created.details: No database in this project (file-based state.json).

code_documentation_complete.details: JSDoc on all public functions. Module header with version. Implementation notes in docs/requirements/REQ-0023-three-verb-backlog-model/implementation-notes.md.
